sentences: Aknaraami k√ºljest on kitt lahti tulnud.
Peab olema tuttav meie erakonna eeskavaga, kogu selle vaimuga, mis on erakonna kitiks.
context: Kitt is an Estonian word for a sticky substance that hardens upon drying and is used to fill cracks and gaps as well as to join objects together. It can refer specifically to putty, caulk, or other sealing compounds commonly used in construction and repair work.
